duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead clients through digital transformation journeys by leveraging industry and technology expertise.
Work with clients to develop technology strategies and plans for digital transformation.
Conduct analysis to address critical business issues and generate insights about client and industry performance improvement.
Design business and technology strategy solutions and present to C-level clients.
Advise clients on digital and technology strategies connecting business ambition with required organizational and technology changes.
Build trusted relationships with senior client stakeholders, influencing transformation decisions through compelling storytelling and thorough analysis.
Guide clients through complex problems and solutions in a simple and well-structured manner.
Lead digital transformation practitioners by managing engagements, demonstrating thought leadership, and mentoring team members.
Leverage the power of cross-discipline teams such as Security, Technology, and Operations to support client engagements.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Technology, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
